basic.blooming: Flowering period June-July, fruiting period August-October
basic.color: Flower color light yellow, fruit color light yellow green

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, slight shade tolerance
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
